document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Limnocoris Stål (Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Limnocorinae) and new state records for species of the genus in Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Limnocoris Stål (Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Limnocorinae) and new state records for species of the genus in Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph: Published records . México : Chiapas , Estado de México , Jalisco , Nayarit , Oaxaca , Veracruz ( Montandon 1897 ; La Rivers 1970 , 1976 ; Rodrigues & Sites 2019 ).

Distribution .
Limnocoris signoreti
is distributed exclusively in Mexico , ranging from the central part of the country south to the state of Chiapas ( Fig. 9 ), and with most of the records south of the Transmexican Volcanic Belt biogeographic province. This species occurs in at least five biogeographic provinces, including the Pacific Lowlands ( Chiapas , Jalisco , Oaxaca ), Sierra Madre del Sur ( Michoacán ), Balsas Basin ( Michoacán , Estado de México ), Veracruzan ( Chiapas , Oaxaca , Veracruz ), and Transmexican Volcanic Belt ( Nayarit ). Of the five specimens ( 2♂ , 2♀ UMC; 1♀ MZUSP) of this species reported by Rodrigues & Sites (2019) from San Mateo Yetla ( Oaxaca ), only one male (UMC) belongs to
L. signoreti
, the remaining specimens belong to the new species
L. rodriguesi
.
